short_summary: INVITATION TO SUBMIT AN EXPRESSION OF INTEREST (EOI) - RESIDENTIAL SPACE FOR LEASE
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada is asking interested ??? Registered Inuit Firms and other parties to provide information for residential units to meet current or possible future requirements, including:...
full_summary:
**Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI) - Ongoing Residential Space for Lease**

**Reference:** cb-593-73754116
**Publication Date:** June 21, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2025, 14:00:00 CT

**Background:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking expressions of interest from interested parties, including Registered Inuit Firms, to provide information on residential units that can meet current or future accommodation requirements.

**Scope:** PSPC is looking for:

- 1-bedroom units and 1 energized parking space
- 2-bedroom units and 1 energized parking space
- 3-bedroom units and 1 energized parking space
- 4-bedroom units and 1 energized parking space

**Lease Components:**
- The proposed residential units must be available for lease for a period of approximately 5 years.
- Each unit must include:
  • A living room
  • A dining area
  • A kitchen with a full-size stove and refrigerator
  • One full bathroom
  • On-site laundry facilities with full-size washer and dryer
  • Sufficient residential storage space
- The proposed space must be located in the City of Iqaluit.
- PSPC will reserve the right to terminate the lease at 90 days' notice.
- PSPC may install equipment to monitor fuel, water, and electricity consumption in/on the proposed residential units.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
The proposed residential units must comply with PSPC's Standards for Leased Residential Accommodation and all applicable laws and regulations.

**How to Submit an EOI:**

To submit an Expression of Interest, please email Candace Joudrey at candace.joudrey@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca or contact her at (431) 777-5041. The tender notice can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website at [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/news-centre).

Please note that PSPC may request a site visit or inspection to assess potential security risks to the proposed space and the public. The proposed space must be in compliance with all relevant codes and regulations. A detailed statement of requirements is available in the tender notice.

---
